INSERT INTO tb_comment (b_idx, m_id, target_id, cmt_secret, cmt_comment, cmt_reg_date, cmt_order) VALUES (#{bIdx}, #{mId}, #{targetId}, 'N', #{cmtComment},NOW(), 0)
